title: MAM X RatMedia: Trailblazer Heroes Debut
description: A small bites setup for the debut of Trailblazer Heroes

items.title: Pokebar
items.description: A self-service poke bar featuring ingredients from the 5 Trailblazer colors. Blue rice, red kimchi, Yellow mango, Green avocado, and black & white tofu will be available.

items.title: Vegan Ube Basque Cheesecake
items.description: A rich, browned cake with a cashew and ube base. Creamy and fluffy.
